name: MazeRoll - The 3D Labyrinth
description:
MazeRoll is a suitable game for everyone and available now for FREE !

NOW ON GOOGLE PLAY : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ThePinkElephant.MazeRoll

♦ GOAL
Roll through the maze , try to find the way out and collect diamonds to buy skins for your ball.

♦ User friendly control 
Use the joystick to roll the ball in a beautiful 3D environment and swipe the screen to rotate the camera.

♦ If you get stuck in the maze (try to find the helpers in the labyrinth)
use the bomb to break the wall 
the wings show you the map from above

[UPDATE]

►+5 levels
►Texture fixes
►Design changes
►Skin shop fix

Good luck & have fun!
